thread.section_title: Gift Card Granny Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gift Card Granny | www.giftcardgranny.com
thread.title: Ann
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by Ann

author: Ann
title: Ann
text: I have always been able to get great deals on gift cards through Gift Card Granny, however, two of the companies partnered with Gift Card Granny that I have purchased from have sold gift cards with a $0 dollar value on more than one occasion. I have received a full refund on these purchases through these companies but it's just frustrating. No customer should have this sort of experiences, especially more than once.
